message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to only pay up to $15000. Would you consider meeting me halfway?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I was really hoping to get closer to the original price I had in mind. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $18000. What do you think?
I understand your position, Alice. Given the current market conditions and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $16000 for the product. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable going below $18000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $17500. This is my last offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I've considered your latest offer, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. My final offer for the product is $17000. I hope this meets your expectations.

I've thought about your latest offer, Bob, and I'm still not comfortable going below $18000. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer it to you for $17250. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I've reviewed your last offer, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I am willing to pay $17000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise and I hope we can agree on this price.
